title: Javapowered
extract: noun. mass noun. 1The state of being connected or interconnected. 'the authorities worked at restoring connectivity between Puerto Rico and the US mainland after Hurricane Hugo' 'Going by their current strengths, these libraries will survive the age of seamless connectivity too.'
